translations.Migration in progress. Please wait until: Tràmuda in cursu. Abeta finas a cando at a acabbare
translations.Only visible to people matched via phone: Visìbile isceti a is persones agatadas cun integratzione de su nùmeru de telèfonu tràmite Talk in mobile
translations.Only visible to people on this instance: Visìbile isceti a is persones invitadas e a is de custa istàntzia
translations.Synchronize to trusted servers and the g: Sincroniza cun serbidores seguros e sa rubrica globale e pùblica
translations.An error occurred while changing your la: Ddoe at àpidu un'errore in su càmbiu de limba. Pro torrare a proare, torra a carrigare sa pàgina.
translations.An error occurred while changing your lo: Ddoe at àpidu un'errore in su càmbiu de localizatzione. Pro torrare a proare, torra a carrigare sa pàgina.
translations.Group list is empty: S'elencu de is grupos est bòida
translations.Unable to retrieve the group list: Non faghet a recuperare s'elencu de is grupos
translations.You added {user} to group {group}: As agiuntu a {user} a su grupu {group}
translations.{actor} added {user} to group {group}: {actor} at agiuntu a {user} a su grupu {group}
translations.An administrator added you to group {gro: Un'utente de s'amministratzione t'at agiuntu a su grupu {group}
translations.An administrator added {user} to group {: Un'utente de s'amministratzione at agiuntu a {user} a su grupu {group}
translations.{actor} removed you from group {group}: {actor} ti nch'at bogadu dae su grupu {group}
translations.You removed {user} from group {group}: Nch'as bogadu a {user} dae su grupu {group}
translations.{actor} removed {user} from group {group: {actor} nch'at bogadu a {user} dae su grupu {group}
translations.An administrator removed you from group: Un'utente de s'amministratzione ti nch'at bogadu dae su grupu {group}
translations.An administrator removed {user} from gro: Un'utente de s'amministratzione nch'at bogadu a {user} dae su grupu {group}
translations.Your <strong>group memberships</strong>: Ispartetzipadas a is grupos tuas sunt istadas modificadas
translations.Your password was reset by an administra: S'amministratzione at torradu a impostare sa crae tua
translations.Your password was reset: Sa crae tua s'est torrada a impostare
translations.{actor} changed your email address: {actor} at cambiadu s'indiritzu tuo de posta eletrònica
translations.You changed your email address: As cambiadu s'indiritzu tuo de posta eletrònica
translations.Your email address was changed by an adm: S'amministratzione at cambiadu s'indiritzu tuo de posta eletrònica
translations.You created app password \"{token}\": As creadu sa crae de s'aplicatzione "{token}"
translations.You deleted app password \"{token}\": As cantzelladu sa crae de s'aplicatzione "{token}"
translations.You renamed app password \"{token}\" to: As cambiadu su nùmene de sa crae dae "{token}" a "{newToken}"
translations.You granted filesystem access to app pas: As permìtidu s'atzessu a filesystem a sa crae de s'aplicatzione "{token}"
translations.You revoked filesystem access from app p: As iscontzadu s'atzessu a filesystem dae sa crae de s'aplicatzione "{token}"
translations.You successfully logged in using two-fac: As fatu s'atzessu cun s'autenticatzione a duos fatores (%1$s)
translations.A login attempt using two-factor authent: Unu tentativu de atzessu cun autenticatzione a duos fatores est faddidu (%1$s)
translations.Your <strong>password</strong> or <stron: S'at modificadu sa crae o suindiritzu de posta tuo
translations.Please provide an admin recovery passwor: Fruni una crae amministrativa de riprìstinu; si nono, s'ant a perdere totu is datos de utente.
translations.Wrong admin recovery password. Please ch: Crae amministrativa de riprìstinu isballiada. Controlla·dda e torra a proare.
translations.Backend doesn't support password change,: Su motore non suportat su càmbiu de crae, ma sa crae de tzifradura de s'utente est agiornada.
translations.installing and updating apps via the app: installatzione e s'agiornamentu de is aplicatziones tràmite sa butega de is aplicatziones o sa cumpartzidura in sa nue federada
translations.cURL is using an outdated %1$s version (: cURL est impreende una versione %1$sagiornada (%2$s). Agiorna su sistema operativu tuo, si nono funtzionalidades comente %3$s no ant a funtzionare.
translations.Could not determine if TLS version of cU: Impossìbile a determinare si sa versione TLS de cURL est betza o nono, ca ddoe at àpidu un'errore durante sa dimanda HTTPS in https://nextcloud.com. Controlla s'archìviu de registru de nextcloud pro àteros detàllios.
translations.Email setting test: Proa de impostatziones de sa posta eletrònica
translations.If you received this email, the email co: Si as retzidu custu messàgiu de posta, sa cunfiguratzione de sa posta eletrònica est andada bene.
translations.Email could not be sent. Check your mail: Impossìbile a imbiare su messàgiu. Controlla s'informe de su serbidore tuo de posta
translations.A problem occurred while sending the ema: Ddoe at àpidu unu problema in s'imbiu de su messàgiu. Controlla is impostatziones. (Errore: %s)
translations.You need to set your user email before b: Deves impostare s'indiritzu de s'utente in antis de proare a imbiare is messàgios de posta.
translations.Unable to change email address: Non faghet a cambiare s'indiritzu de posta eletrònica
translations.Unable to set invalid phone number: Non faghet a impostare nùmeru de telèfonu non bàlidu
translations.Some account data was invalid: Unos datos de su contu non finat bàlidos
translations.In order to verify your Twitter account,: Pro verificare su contu de Twitter tuo, pùblica in Tweeter su tweet in fatu (assegura·ti de ddu publicare in una lìnia ebbia):
translations.In order to verify your Website, store t: Pro verificare su situ tuo, sarva su cuntenutu in fatu in sa raighina de su situ in '.well-known/CloudIdVerificationCode.txt' (assegura·ti chi siat in una lìnia ebbia):
%1$s at cambiadu sa crae tua in %2$s.
Sa crae tua de %s est istada cambiada.
translations.Your password on %s was reset by an admi: S'amministratzione at torradu a impostare sa crae tua de %s.
Sa crae tua de %s s'est torrada a impostare.
translations.Password for %1$s changed on %2$s: Sa crae pro %1$s est cambiada in %2$s
translations.If you did not request this, please cont: Si non dd'as pedidu tue, cuntata s'amministratzione.
S'indiritzu de posta tuo in %s est istadu cambiadu.
translations.Your email address on %s was changed by: S'amministratzione at cambiadu s'indiritzu de posta tuo in %s.
translations.Email address for %1$s changed on %2$s: S'indiritzu de posta pro %1$s est cambiadu in %2$s
translations.The new email address is %s: S'indiritzu nou de posta eletrònica est %s
translations.Your %s account was created: Su contu tuo %s est istadu creadu
translations.Welcome to your %s account, you can add,: Ti donamus sa benebènnida a su contu %s, podes agiùnghere, amparare e cumpartzire is datos tuos.
translations.Logged in user must be a subadmin: S'utente devet essere de sa suta-amministratzione
translations.A background job is pending that checks: Un'atividade in segundu pianu est in isetu pro controllare is tzertificados SSL importados dae s'utente. Torra a controllare prus a tardu.
translations.Limit app usage to groups: Lìmita s'impreu de s'aplicatzione a grupos
translations.No apps found for your version: Peruna aplicatzione agatada pro sa versione tua
translations.Password change is disabled because the: Su càmbiu de sa crae est disativadu ca sa crae printzipale est disativada
translations.The app will be downloaded from the app: S'aplicatzione s'at a iscarrigare dae sa butega de is aplicatziones
translations.An error occured during the request. Una: Ddoe at àpidu un'errore in sa dimanda. Impossìbile a sighire.
